body.name: WLIVE Dresser for Bedroom with 5 Drawers, Wide Bedroom Dresser with Drawer Organizers, Chest of Drawers, Fabric Dresser for Living Room, Closet, Hallway, Charcoal Black Wood Grain Print

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Multifunction Dresser: This fabric dresser is ideal for bedroom, closet, living room, hallway, dorm and office. The bedroom dresser can also hold small-size TV to be a TV stand.
For All Storage Needs: 3 wide drawers are great for small items like socks, underwear; 2 deep drawers are designed for large items like clothes, blankets, which can make things more organized.

Multifunction Dresser Organizer: This storage dresser can be used as an entryway table and a closet dresser for both inside and outside the closet. Wooden top can place things you want to display or keep in reach, such as lamp, photos…

Durable Construction: Sturdy steel frame offers stable support and ensures years of use; 4 adjustable feet can protect your floor from scratches; the non-woven synthetic fabric is breathable and harmless; easy pull handles help open and close the drawers.
Overall Dimension: The wide chest of drawers measures 39.4" L x 11.8" W x 26.8" H. With detailed instructions and all hardware needed, the dresser for bedroom is easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Closet Organizer for My Daughter's Bedroom!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the WLIVE Dresser to serve as a closet organizer in my daughter's bedroom, and it has proven to be an excellent addition.Assembly and Setup:Setting up the dresser was a breeze, even for a non-expert like me. The instructions were clear, and I had it ready in no time.Design and Appearance:The dresser's dark grey color and modern design fit perfectly into my daughter's bedroom decor. It not only adds style but also enhances the overall organization of her closet space.Drawer Organization:The included drawer organizer and side pockets have been a lifesaver in keeping my daughter's clothes, accessories, and belongings neatly organized within her closet. Everything is now easily accessible, making our daily routines smoother.Storage Capacity:The five spacious drawers offer ample storage space for my daughter's clothing and personal items. The different drawer sizes are perfect for organizing her belongings efficiently.Build Quality:The dresser feels well-built and sturdy, assuring me that it will withstand the wear and tear of daily use in a child's room.Functionality:Functionally, this dresser has exceeded my expectations. It effectively maximizes the closet space, making it much more efficient and organized.Space Efficiency:It's space-efficient, a significant advantage for smaller bedrooms like my daughter's. The side pockets provide extra storage without taking up additional floor space.Ease of Maintenance:Cleaning and maintaining the dresser's fabric surface is straightforward, which is essential in a child's room.Value for Money:Considering its quality, functionality, and the peace of mind it brings to an organized closet, this dresser is a valuable investment.Long-Term Durability:I've had this dresser in my daughter's room for several months, and it's still in perfect condition. It's proven to be a reliable addition to her closet.Overall Impression:The WLIVE Dresser has transformed my daughter's closet into a well-organized and efficient space. It's a fantastic solution for parents looking to upgrade their child's closet and keep everything in order.Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Five stars for its design, organization features, and its role in simplifying our daily routines. Highly recommended for children's rooms!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together, cloth drawers
reviews.reviewText: This is a temporary dresser for my father in assisted living while we figure things out. It has a nice narrow profile, and the drawers are hard-front but made of cloth like cube storage would be. It was very easy to put together. It might be a bit small for what some people are looking for, double check the measurements

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy but small
reviews.reviewText: The dresser is exactly as described. It is very sturdy and was easy to buy together but it is smaller than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but a bit deceiving
reviews.reviewText: Nice dresser. However it is very small my child is 6 and it's a bit shorter than he is. Nicely made. But honestly thought it would be bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality control
reviews.reviewText: Whoever is running the Quality Control department needs a bonus. I've assembled many similar products and this has been the best. Everything fit perfectly. The directions were simple and clear. It also really looks nice. Well done!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, sturdy, and a great value.
reviews.reviewText: Everything about this dresser is good. The only issue I have is with the two side drawers. They are just a little too small to put pants/jeans in unless you fold them in thirds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very flimsy. Not something to use every day
reviews.reviewText: I used this dresser for under garments/shorts/ light pants. Very annoying when pulling the drawers out because the weight would make them fall out. I won’t recommend unless you’re getting for something you don’t see yourself using every day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On the small side
reviews.reviewText: So, I originally purchased this for my bedroom. The reviews said how small it was. I was going to send it ack but decided to just put it together. It comes together in no time. It is short, so if you are using it for a child's bedroom it will work. An adult bedroom, not so much. I ended up putting it in my bathroom as storage, and its perfect
